featured.text: RTRI researchers say late-night tests, at times when deer are most frequently seen by railway tracks, have resulted in a 45 percent reduction of deer sighting.

definition.zh_def: 目擊，觀察到某物或某人的行為或存在。
definition.en_def: The act of seeing or observing something, especially something unusual or noteworthy.
definition.example: The birdwatchers were excited by the sighting of a rare species in the area.
